More faces than spaces?
Find a solution to workplace parking problems
Parking problems

Got more staff than parking spaces?

Is juggling limited spaces a daily hassle?

If you’re an Auckland business with more demand for parking than supply, PARKALOTT makes it easy to manage your spaces. This easy-to-use solution doesn’t require expensive on-site hardware and it’s available for as little as $50 a month.

Using workplace parking more fairly and efficiently is valuable to your business in many ways:

Happier staff Take away the stresses and inefficiency of free-for-all parking

Boost occupancy Minimise the time these valuable assets sit empty

Save time Less parking admin means more time spent on your business

Try before you buy
Get PARKLALOTT FREE for 3 months

Call <telephone number> or complete the short form below and you could try PARKALOTT FREE for 3 months. It’s a great way to see how PARKALOTT can improve your workplace parking - and there’s no obligation after the trial period.

Optional

FAQs

How does PARKALOTT work?

PARKALOTT is a web-based application which your staff download onto their smartphones and then use to manage your workplace parking

Does PARKALOTT need equipment?

PARKALOTT is operated by smartphones, so there’s no need to install hardware on-site.

Can we continue using PARKALOTT after the 3-month trial?

Yes. You simply carry on using PARKALOTT as you have been and then pay a monthly fee dependent on the size of your business.

What if we don’t want to continue using PARKALOTT after the 3-month trial?

No problem, we’ll switch off your business’s access to PARKALOTT and there’s no cost to you.
